The elder<S>4245</S> unto the elect<S>1588</S> lady<S>2959</S> and<S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> children<S>5043</S>, whom<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> love<S>25</S> in<S>1722</S> the truth<S>225</S>; and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> I<S>1473</S> only<S>3441</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> they that have known<S>1097</S> the truth<S>225</S>;
For<S>1223</S> the truth's sake<S>225</S>, which<S>3588</S> dwelleth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall be<S>2071</S> with<S>3326</S> us<S>2257</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
Grace<S>5485</S> be<S>2071</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>, mercy<S>1656</S>, and peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S> the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>3844</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, the Son<S>5207</S> of the Father<S>3962</S>, in<S>1722</S> truth<S>225</S> and<S>2532</S> love<S>26</S>. <sup>be: Gr. shall be</sup>
I rejoiced<S>5463</S> greatly<S>3029</S> that<S>3754</S> I found<S>2147</S> of<S>1537</S> thy<S>4675</S> children<S>5043</S> walking<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> truth<S>225</S>, as<S>2531</S> we have received<S>2983</S> a commandment<S>1785</S> from<S>3844</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> I beseech<S>2065</S> thee<S>4571</S>, lady<S>2959</S>, not<S>3756</S> as though<S>5613</S> I wrote<S>1125</S> <S>1125</S> a new<S>2537</S> commandment<S>1785</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, but<S>235</S> that which<S>3739</S> we had<S>2192</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>, that<S>2443</S> we love<S>25</S> one another<S>240</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> love<S>26</S>, that<S>2443</S> we walk<S>4043</S> after<S>2596</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>. This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the commandment<S>1785</S>, That<S>2443</S>, as<S>2531</S> ye have heard<S>191</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>, ye should walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> it<S>846</S>.
For<S>3754</S> many<S>4183</S> deceivers<S>4108</S> are entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>, who<S>3588</S> confess<S>3670</S> not<S>3361</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> is come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>. This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> a deceiver<S>4108</S> and<S>2532</S> an antichrist<S>500</S>.
Look<S>991</S> to yourselves<S>1438</S>, that<S>3363</S> we lose<S>622</S> not<S>3363</S> those things which<S>3739</S> we have wrought<S>2038</S>, but<S>235</S> that we receive<S>618</S> a full<S>4134</S> reward<S>3408</S>. <sup>wrought: or, gained, some copies read, ye have gained, but that ye, etc.</sup>
Whosoever<S>3956</S> transgresseth<S>3845</S>, and<S>2532</S> abideth<S>3306</S> not<S>3361</S> in<S>1722</S> the doctrine<S>1322</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, hath<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> God<S>2316</S>. He that abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> the doctrine<S>1322</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, he<S>3778</S> hath<S>2192</S> both<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> the Son<S>5207</S>.
If<S>1536</S> there come<S>2064</S> any<S>1536</S> <S>5100</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> bring<S>5342</S> not<S>3756</S> this<S>5026</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>, receive<S>2983</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3361</S> into<S>1519</S> your house<S>3614</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3361</S> bid<S>3004</S> him<S>846</S> God speed<S>5463</S>:
For<S>1063</S> he that biddeth<S>3004</S> him<S>846</S> God speed<S>5463</S> is partaker<S>2841</S> of his<S>846</S> evil<S>4190</S> deeds<S>2041</S>.
Having<S>2192</S> many things<S>4183</S> to write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, I would<S>1014</S> not<S>3756</S> write with<S>1223</S> paper<S>5489</S> and<S>2532</S> ink<S>3188</S>: but<S>235</S> I trust<S>1679</S> to come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> speak<S>2980</S> face<S>4750</S> to<S>4314</S> face<S>4750</S>, that<S>2443</S> our<S>2257</S> joy<S>5479</S> may be<S>5600</S> full<S>4137</S>. <sup>face to: Gr. mouth to mouth</sup> <sup>our: or, your</sup>
The children<S>5043</S> of thy<S>4675</S> elect<S>1588</S> sister<S>79</S> greet<S>782</S> thee<S>4571</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
